query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS facilities (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  nameEn VARCHAR(100),
  description LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
  descriptionEn LONGTEXT,
  icon VARCHAR(50),
  images LONGTEXT,
  displayOrder INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT true NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4C7dh5n6yXuaUbo.root --database Un9ncnuBxgCCtamkr3qHdr --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS facilities (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  nameEn VARCHAR(100),
  description LONGTEXT NOT NULL,
  descriptionEn LONGTEXT,
  icon VARCHAR(50),
  images LONGTEXT,
  displayOrder INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT true NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
